title: "Most Runs in an Innings"
format: html
execute:
  echo: false
  warning: false
---

```{r}
#| message: false
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

# Fetch the data
url <- "https://www.espncricinfo.com/records/most-runs-in-an-innings-284198"
page <- read_html(url)

df <- page %>%
  html_element("table") %>%
  html_table()

# Ensure numeric Runs
df <- df %>%
  mutate(Runs = as.numeric(gsub("[^0-9]", "", Runs))) %>%
  slice_max(Runs, n = 10)

# Plot
ggplot(df, aes(x = reorder(Batsman, Runs), y = Runs)) +
  geom_col(fill = "steelblue") +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(
    title = "Top 10 Highest Individual Scores",
    x = "Batsman",
    y = "Runs"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
